page.title: 10ATTITUDES IN CROSTON
page.content: Most people are concerned about the {heavy traffic}which passes through on the narrow roads of Croston to and from Chorley. Parking is permitted on both sides of the roads in order to slow down the traffic.Public{transport is considered poor and expensive with insufficient buses at night. Most established families are not concerned about the influence of{new- {comers}during the last 15 yrs although some feel that{new housing}is spoiling the character of the village. {Parents}of schoolchildren are worried about{unemployment}and some feel there should be more{schools}in the area. It is considered a{law-abiding}village with adequate police presence but some concern about minor{vandalism}and{teen {-agers}being a nuisance.{Young people feel there is not enough going on and isolated due to lack of transport.
